text: Secrets of Deltora is a fictional book in the Deltora Quest series written by Emily Rodda and illustrated by Marc McBride. This book is a fictional travel guide around Deltora, written from the point of view of Doran the Dragonlover. == References == Category:2009 Australian novels Category:Deltora Category:2009 fantasy novels Category:Fictional atlases Category:Books about dragons
title: Secrets of Deltora
